data.text: @MthrVictoria ThaNk you, that would be lovely . for him to take to hospital with him
@ElaineDando Would you like me to post you one? DM me your address? And many prayers for your husband and for you in the forthcoming days

@MthrVictoria I will receive one from you, virtually. We cannot go to an Ash Wednesday service, today, because my husband has to isolate with me after a PCR test, in preparation for his exploratory operation at the weekend. It’s good to have a tangible reminder of penitence and God’s mercy.
@Mccrimmons @ElaineDando Don’t we just  … and prayers for the whole world as we acknowledge our brokenness.
@MthrVictoria @ElaineDando The Holy Water blessing sounds like a good idea! We all  need all the help we can get now 🙏🤍✝️
@shuleyamsingi Oh how lovely that you still have it. :-) And even lovelier that this year is to be blessed with gathered worship. May God bless you both richly
